name: Down The Deep
description:
In this game, you can feel like an underwater explorer.

Search for different secrets, dive deeper, and most importantly stay alive!

In this game, you should pay attention to almost everything! Control your oxygen level, watch out for obstacles, do not bump into walls. And remember: Keep Up!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Escape key or P key - pause

Good luck, you will need it!
